name: RC Dash (itch)
description:
Dash to a high score in this racing platformer to become #1 on the leaderboards. 

Dodge obstacles, perform tricky jumps, and grab all collectables while trying to reach the finish line as fast as possible for a new high score!

Customize a car to your unique style.

Use the level editor to build custom levels to challenge your friends with.

NOTE: The itchio version of the game does not include Leaderboards or ability to share custom levels via cloud. These features are only available in the Steam version.

You can find your custom levels in the following folders and share them with your friends to copy to their game.

Windows: %USERPROFILE%/AppData/LocalLow/plyoung/rcdash/Levels
Linux: ~/.config/unity3d/plyoung/rcdash/Levels
